summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1260, for the improvement of East Roy Street, from Eighteenth Avenue North to Twenty-third Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks on both side thereof, between Eighteenth Avenue North and Nineteenth Avenue North and on the south side thereof between Nineteenth Avenue North and Twenty-third Avenue North, under Ordinance No. 13840 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
